link_desc:
• Review of monitoring item name
  • Fix LLD rule
    • multi core CPU
    • CPU temperature
    • Network interface [send, receive, error, discard, status]
    • Storage
  • Monitoring Power-comsuption, Power-current [can not be acquired with some Routerboards.]
  • monitoring snmp [info, contact, admin]
  • ping check
  • 4.0 that I can check the operation.
  • cpu load 1min average -> RouterOS 6.35 or later

snmp community macro setting -> {$SNMP_COMMUNITY}

If you need maintenance, please create an issue with github.

https://github.com/kometchtech/Zabbix_Template_Routerboard
author: Yoshihito Horigome
